title: Is Avalanche Defenseman Cale Makar the Stephen Curry of Hockey?
description: “You think you’ve got him, but you don’t,” Lightning defenseman Mikhail Sergachev said. “He just uses you as bait and as a screen. He’s very, very dangerous.”
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:credit: Isaiah J. Downing/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Cale Makar moves laterally like no one else in the N.H.L., leaving opposing players stumbling on the ice.
